scripts.dev:bff: cd apps/bff && set PORT=3006 && npm run dev
scripts.start:bff: cd apps/bff && set PORT=3006 && node index.js
scripts.docker:build:fresh: docker system prune -f && docker-compose -f docker-compose.ecosystem.yml build --no-cache --pull
scripts.docker:production:rebuild: docker-compose -f infra/deployment/docker-compose.production.yml down && docker system prune -f && docker-compose -f infra/deployment/docker-compose.production.yml build --no-cache --pull && docker-compose -f infra/deployment/docker-compose.production.yml up -d
scripts.docker:clean: docker system prune -af && docker volume prune -f
scripts.test:admin: curl http://localhost:3005/api/admin/health || echo 'Admin endpoints not available'
